About KaleLift

Suspended access solutions for Africa & Europe

Our Story

Founded in 2003, KaleLift was created to serve international projects. Based in Büyükçekmece, Istanbul, Turkey with a logistics hub in Johannesburg, Gauteng, 2001, South Africa, we focus on reliable suspended access for Africa and Europe.

Our mission started with building safe, compliant platforms and supporting crews on site. We expanded into rentals, sales, and engineering support for high-rise construction, facade restoration, and industrial maintenance.

Today we work with contractors and facility owners across multiple countries, delivering export-ready documentation, training, and responsive support from planning to dismantling.

20+
Years in access systems
500+
Projects delivered
100+
Client teams supported
10+
Markets served

Our Mission

Deliver safe suspended access systems with clear planning, certification, and on-site support that keeps projects moving.

Our Vision

To be the most trusted export partner for suspended platforms across Africa and Europe.

Our Values

Safety, transparency, responsiveness, and engineering discipline guide everything we do.

Certifications & Standards

CE Certification

CE-marked systems with documentation suited to European project requirements.

TSE Standards

Manufactured to Turkish Standards Institution requirements with regular audits.

ISO 9001

Quality management processes that keep manufacturing and service consistent.

Safety Standards

International safety procedures and risk assessments applied to every site.

Why Choose KaleLift

Certified Export Packages

Every shipment includes CE/TSE compliance checks and export-ready documentation for Africa and Europe projects.

Experienced Field Teams

On-site crews and remote engineers support planning, installation, and safe handover.

Cost-Focused Rentals

Rental programs that reduce upfront costs while keeping the right equipment on site.

Quality Control

Consistent manufacturing and inspection routines keep systems stable and reliable.

Rapid Response

Fast turnaround on quotes, parts, and technical questions across time zones.

Warranty & Spares

Genuine parts and warranty coverage protect uptime and safety on site.

Safety Oversight

Safety-first procedures and compliant training for crews and supervisors.

Engineering Desk

Custom drawings and load planning from in-house engineers and technical staff.

Flexible Payments

Payment options and staged schedules tailored to export project timelines.
